thread.section_title: Balmoral Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent choice
thread.title_full: Excellent choice - Review of Balmoral Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: carlosmaravall
title: Excellent choice
text: Charming place. Obviously rooms are tight (this is Paris), but everything was new, nice and clean. Perfectly located. The breakfast is generously served and, if you are an early bird, you can pick newspapers from a wide selection of countries. Business travellers: almost no waiting time at the reception desk to checkout (given the small size of the hotel I guess this is possible -not just my experience).
